name: save-princess
description:
Using Tiny Forest RPG assets

Core Loop

Input: Keyboard (WASD and ESC) and Left Mouse Button

Actions : Move forward, backward, left, right, Attack, and Show menu.

Obstacles: Walls, Rivers, Enemies and Bosses.

Goal: Keep alive, Defeat enemies and bosses, Collect coins, Upgrade yourself and Save the princess

Description

A prince defeats enemies, overcomes difficulties and defeats the final boss and finally rescues the princess.
